newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Ningxia Ferroalloy to offer 80 mln A shares.
newsitem.headline: Ningxia Ferroalloy to offer 80 mln A shares.

text.p: Ningxia Pingluo Ferroalloy Group Co Ltd plans to issue 80 million A shares and list them on the Shenzhen market, a company spokesman said on Wednesday.
The issue, which requires approval from the China Securities Regulatory Commission, is expected to be launched next year, he told the Hong Kong-based newsletter China Securities Bulletin.
The company, in Pingluo county in the northwest region of Ningxia, has 150 million outstanding shares, he said but did not give a breakdown of the share capital.
The official said the firm expects net profits of 16 million yuan this year, compared with 15 million in 1995 and nine million in 1994.
An underwriter for the offer has yet to be selected, he added but gave no more details.
